DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study study use clinical radiological parameter treatment three-part four-part fracture Winsta PH osteosynthesis device ( Fischer Medical ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Treatment Fractures Humerus With Plate .
DOC.detailed_description: We shall measure follow clinical parameter help Constant Shoulder Score ( CSS ) Western Ontario Osteoarthritis Shoulder Index ( WOOS ) : 1 . Pain 2 . Activities Daily Living ( ADL ) 3 . Range Motion ( ROM ) 4 . Muscle strength We shall measure follow radiologic parameter : 1 . Healing ( migration ) tuberculum majus minus measure use MB-RSA 2 . Plate migration use MB-RSA 3 . Bone density proximal humerus measure Dual Energy X-ray Absorptiometry ( DEXA ) 4 . Correlation bone density prosthesis migration ( tuberculum migration )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients threepart fourpart proximal humeral fracture 2 . Aged 50 year old fit 3 . Informed , write consent 4 . A functioning shoulder preoperatively 1 . Patients find unsuitable preoperatively shoulder Philos Plate 2 . Patients age 85 old 3 . Patients rheumatoid arthritis 4 . Patients previously undergone shoulder plastic major shoulder surgery 5 . Patients unable avoid NSAID surgery 6 . Patients require regular systemic steroid treatment 7 . Female patient take hormone substitution 8 . Female patient fertile age range use safe anticonception ( oral contraception , intrauterine device , depot gestagens , vaginal hormone ring ) 9 . Patients metabolic bone disease
